page.title: 10ARTS AND CRAFTS IN CHINGFORD
page.content: { Friday Hill House},a very old building, is now used as an adult education centre.Adults learn things like,porcelain painting,pottery, tapestry,weaving upholstery,cooking, painting(oil and water colour) and embroidery.This is a good place to learn arts and crafts because of it's historic surroundings. When we went there a man told us about the building and showed us a fireplace built in 1668.We went down into the cellars,it was very dark and smelly.Upstairs some men were doing some paint work,they had found an old mural and they were renovating it. We discovered when the building was finished when we saw on the porch out- side the date,1839. Afew times a year the local painting society have an exhibition on the green where you can by their work.
